duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft legal documents and manage case files related to family law and administrative law.
Handle family court pleadings, financial declarations, and motions for temporary relief.
Manage the discovery process, including drafting requests and responses, organizing documents, and preparing for depositions and trial.
Review and analyze legal documents and evidence to identify key issues.
Communicate effectively with clients, opposing counsel, and other members of the legal team.
Accurately document case information and record time spent on tasks.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Paralegal Studies or related field
